name: The Lamentation
description:
Dropped on a mysterious island, you need to come to terms with what happened here with nothing but your own fragmented memories and whatever scraps you can find to go off of.     

----

Developed by myself over the course of a recent COVID-19-related lockdown primarily to familiarize myself with the Unity engine and prepare myself for other projects I have in mind.    

This represents a very "rough" draft of what this game will hopefully look like at some point.  If you enjoyed it, or even if you hated it please feel free to reach out either through here or on my Twitter/Reddit accounts linked in my profile to give me feedback.  I'm just dipping my toes in this medium and am always open to helpful criticism.
